Private Attributes

EVP_PKEY * mpKey

Detailed Description

Provides API to encrypt and decrypt. 

 //Generate key pair.
 gaia::security::KeyAttribute ka(gaia::security::AlgoType_RSA, 1024);
 gaia::security::KeyFactory kf(ka);
 EVP_PKEY* key;
 key = kf.generateKeyPair();

 //construct private key instance
 gaia::security::PrivateKey privateKey(key);
 
 //use private key to encrypt,suppose "pEncryptedString" is encrypted
 by public key.
 unsigned char* pDecryptedString = privateKey.decryptData(pEncryptedString);
 
 //use private key to encrypt data.
 unsigned char* pIn = (unsigned char*)"test";
 unsigned char* pOut = privateKey.signData(pIn);

int32_t  inLen 
)

Use the private key to encrypt input data.

Only its corresponding public key can decrypt the signed data.

Parameters:
pInputBufferInput data.
Returns:
Encrypted data.
